product.installCmd: cmd.exe /C " cd "$tempDir" && "$supportDir\7za.exe" x "INSTALL_BINARY" && TEMP_BINARY.exe /extract && TEMP_BINARY.msi /q /quiet /l*v install_$productKey.log "
product.uninstallCmd: cmd.exe /C " msiexec.exe /q /l*v uninstall_$productKey.log /x $productGuid MSIRESTARTMANAGERCONTROL=Disable NO_DRIVER_INSTALL=1 && rmdir /S /Q "$installedDir" | echo "
cmd.exe /C " msiexec.exe /q /l*v uninstall_$productKey.log /x $productGuid MSIRESTARTMANAGERCONTROL=Disable NO_DRIVER_INSTALL=1 && rmdir /S /Q "$installedDir" | echo "
cmd.exe /C "msiexec.exe /q /l*v uninstall_$productKey.log /x $productGuid MSIRESTARTMANAGERCONTROL=Disable NO_DRIVER_INSTALL=1 && rmdir /S /Q "$installedDir" | echo "
cmd.exe /C "msiexec.exe /q /l*v uninstall_$productKey.log /x $productGuid MSIRESTARTMANAGERCONTROL=Disable NO_DRIVER_INSTALL=1 && rmdir /S /Q "$installedDir" | echo "

product.installCmd: cmd.exe /C " cd "$tempDir" && "$supportDir\7za.exe" x "$baseBinary" -obase && "$supportDir\7za.exe" x "INSTALL_BINARY" -oupdate && cd "$tempDir\base" && install_cl.exe -action new -dir "$installPath" -manifest manifest.xml -stage stage.zip -hklm "Software\Analog Devices\VisualDSP++ 5.0" -use-date -verbosity terse && python.exe "$supportDir\touch.py" "$installPath\System\runtarget.exe" && python.exe "$supportDir\touch.py" "$installPath\System\cl_sim10x.exe" && python.exe "$supportDir\touch.py" "$installPath\System\cl_sim535.exe" && python.exe "$supportDir\touch.py" "$installPath\nile.exe" && python.exe "$supportDir\touch.py" "$installPath\danube.exe" && cd "$tempDir\update" && install_cl.exe -action update -dir "$installPath" -manifest manifest.xml -stage stage.zip -hklm "Software\Analog Devices\VisualDSP++ 5.0" -use-date -verbosity terse -no-setup-inf -no-license-check"
product.uninstallCmd: cmd.exe /C ""$installedDir\install_cl.exe" -action remove -dir "$installedDir" -manifest "$installedDir\manifest.xml" -scrub-hku -hklm "Software\Analog Devices\VisualDSP++ 5.0" -use-date -verbosity terse -no-setup-inf &&rmdir /S /Q "$installedDir" | echo "

product.installCmd: cmd.exe /C "cd "$tempDir" &&"$supportDir\7za.exe" x "INSTALL_BINARY" &&install_CL.exe -action new -dir "$installPath" -manifest manifest.xml -stage stage.zip -hklm "Software\Analog Devices\VisualDSP++ 5.1.1" -use-date -verbosity terse "
product.uninstallCmd: cmd.exe /C ""$installPath\install_CL.exe" -action remove -dir "$installPath" -manifest "$installPath\manifest.xml" -scrub-hku -hklm "Software\Analog Devices\VisualDSP++ 5.1.1" -use-date -verbosity terse -no-setup-inf &&rmdir /S /Q "$installPath" | echo "

product.productName: Linux Add-in for CrossCore Embedded Studio
